column5: 2.9 miles from AT&T Stadium on the south side of 30 next to UT Arlington and 10 minutes from Six Flags over Texas. Perfect for 1-2 families to share or a group of adults! Great amenities. Cozy and festive backyard with a brand new hot tub, covered patio with seating and an outdoor television. Perfect home for a family or a medium sized group on a budget. Brand new appliances, new carpet, updated and nice, simple design. Lots of TV's. Cable package, great kitchen.
